Key Match Events: The Rockets went on a 17-0 run in the third quarter, turning the game around
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Taylor Jenkins criticized the team's inability to rebound and get stops, and Ja Morant admitted to increasing his playing time
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies struggled with turnovers and missed open shots, while the Rockets' physicality affected the outcome
Others: The game was significant as it was the second straight road game for the Grizzlies before their home opener
